definition: 1. Of or relating to a system; common to a system; as, the systemic circulation of the blood. 2. (Anat. & Physiol.)  Of or pertaining to the general system, or the body as a whole; as, systemic death, in distinction from local death; systemic circulation, in distinction from pulmonic circulation; systemic diseases. Systemic death. See the Note under Death, n., 1.
